title: 'Difficult decisions' to come, say Premier League, EFL & PFA
description: The Premier League, EFL and PFA issue a joint statement warning of "difficult decisions" to come.
content:
Leicester beat Aston Villa 4-0 on 9 March - the last Premier League action
"Difficult decisions will have to be taken" to counter the financial impact of coronavirus on English football, say the Premier League, EFL and Professional Footballers' Association.… [+944 chars]
